属性 #

NameDescriptionTypeDefault
model-value / v-modelbinding value^[string] / ^[number] / ^[boolean]—
labelthe value of Radio^[string] / ^[number] / ^[boolean]—
disabledwhether Radio is disabled^[boolean]false
borderwhether to add a border around Radio^[boolean]false
sizesize of the Radio^[enum]'large' | 'default' | 'small'—
namenative name attribute^[string]—

NameDescriptionType
